rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.title: A review of factors that influence individual compliance with mass drug administration for elimination of lymphatic filariasis
rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.description: Background: The success of programs to eliminate lymphatic filariasis (LF) depends in large part on their ability to achieve and sustain high levels of compliance with mass drug administration (MDA). This paper reports results from a comprehensive review of factors that affect compliance with MDA.
rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.authors: Krentel, A., Fischer, P.U., Weil, G.J.
rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.pdf_file_name: MULTICOUNTRY Global/Krentel et al 2013 PLOS NTD Review of factors affecting MDA.pdf
